name: Rescue Quest- Draw to Survive
description: "In the game "Bob's Adventure," you take control of the protagonist, Bob, as he sets out to reach a flag located at the end of each level. Your task is to use your artistic skills to draw a path for Bob to follow, navigating through obstacles and collecting coins along the way. As you progress through the levels, the challenges will increase, requiring precise and creative solutions. Help Bob make it to the flag and claim his victory in this exciting and fun-filled adventure game."
